main.name: CHRIS EMERFOLL
main.description: I am a Full-Stack Web Development Engineer.  I use react and JavaScript to develop modern and next level web applications
main.bio: I am thrilled to be breaking into the world of creating and web development. Getting into an ever changing field where there is always room to grow and keep learning has been a goal of mine for many years now and I can not wait to see what exciting challenges and opportunities are waiting for me. During the day you will find me programming and working on projects but at night… I guess you will still find me programming, BUT when I’m not programming you can find me paddle boarding out on the lakes, rock climbing, playing card games, or just hanging out at home watching youtube with my cat and dog. At the end of the day I am pretty laid back about most things and always looking for the best way to get things done. I enjoy work that challenges me to think outside my comfort zone and try new things. I get very passionate about my projects but also about relaxing and taking time off, because if you don’t take care of yourself, it’s hard to help and take care of others.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Most of my skills, as of now, are JavaScript and React based but I am working on other languages and frameworks.

education.description: Prime is a program to help students learn to become full-stack web developers. Through Prime I was able to learn: React, Javascript, Git/GitHub, jQuery, Node.js, Express.js, HTML/CSS, Bootstrap, Material-UI servers-side technologies and many other technology tools.

work.title: Full-Stack Software Engineering Student
work.description: Solo Project: Beer Book - (link below in portfolio) - For our solo projects we got to pick whatever we wanted and make a C.R.U.D. application for it. For my solo project I created a full-stack web application for users (beer lovers) to find, add, and track different kinds of beers they have tried and whether or not they enjoyed them. Technologies used: PostgreSQL, Express.js, ReactJS, Node.js, Passport.js, Redux, Redux-Saga, CSS, Material-UI, Heroku
work.description2: Group Project: SnowSwaps - (link below in portfolio) - The group project was our capstone project. As a group of four we took on a real client to designed and created the app they asked us to build. My group was tasked with creating a Mobile-friendly online marketplace for members of snow-loving communities to buy, sell, or browse used snow-sport equipment. Technologies used: PostgreSQL, Express.js, ReactJS, Node.js, NodeMailer.js, Passport.js, Redux, Redux-Saga, CSS, Material-UI, Heroku

work.title: Senior Computer Technician
work.description: Collaborated with other Senior Technicians to resolve workflow issues, production speed, and traceability on units processed.
work.description2: Designed a program to track and examine the quality of all repairs performed by Apple or other “out-of-house” companies.
work.description3: Performed more complicated hardware repairs on computers. Replaced components on computers like screens, LogicBoards, ports, and other non-user replaceable parts.
work.description4: Interfaced with a diverse customer base multiple times daily to find the right products and resolve issues.

work.title: Assembly Line Worker
work.description: Assembled machinery in a collaborative and fast paced work environment while maintaining a clean and organized workstation and safe work practices.
work.description2: Operated cranes, hoists, and other heavy machinery.
work.description3: Built generator engines, carburetors, oil pans, etc.

work.title: Machine Operator
work.description: Examined PC boards for any defects, faulty components, insufficient soldering, and blueprint discrepancies.
work.description2: Set-up, programmed, and operated “pick and place” SMT machines.
work.description3: Directed inspection and support staff for any machine issues and machine changeovers.

work.title: Machine Operator
work.description: Operated silicone injection molding and various other machines for medical devices.
work.description2: Directed other operators on when a model change over would occur.
work.description3: Examined medical device parts and products for any flaws or imperfections.
work.description4: Logged and tracked information into computer software for traceability.
